channel.title: About on Zangwei
channel.description: Recent content in About on Zangwei

item.title: About Me
item.author: zhengzangw@gmail.com (Zangwei (Alex) Zheng)
item.description: I am a Ph.D. student at National University of Singapore, advised by Prof. Yang You. I received my B.Sc. in Computer Science from Nanjing University in 2021. I spent one year in iCyPy at UC Berkeley from Apr. 2020, supervised by Prof. Alberto L. Sangiovanni-Vincentelli and Dr. Xiangyu Yue.

item.title: Research Interest
item.author: zhengzangw@gmail.com (Zangwei (Alex) Zheng)
item.description: My current research mainly focus on Video Generation, Efficient ML (machine learning) and Large-scale DL (Deep Learning) Optimization. Video Generation: large-scale video generation model, video control and alignment. Large-scale DL Optimization: optimizer design (faster, memory-efficient, robust, etc.), optimizer explanation, data-model-algorithm connections. Efficient ML: computation-efficient training (accelerated optimizer, large batch training, incremental learning), memory-efficient training, efficient inference. I am always happy to chat about interesting research ideas.

item.title: News
item.author: zhengzangw@gmail.com (Zangwei (Alex) Zheng)
item.description: [2025.3] Open-Sora 2.0 released! Despite limited compute, it achieves Sora-level metrics and fulfills our initial vision of providing an open-source Sora implementation ðŸš€ [2024.9] Got one paper (MSIER) accepted to EMNLP 2024. Congratulations to Yang Luo! [2024.9] VideoOcean is now online! Generate your own video with a few clicks. [2024.6] Got one paper (Dataset Growth) accepted to ECCV 2024. Congratulations to Ziheng Qin! [2024.6] Open-Sora 1.2 released! A 1.1B models on >30M data with improved performance.

item.title: Projects

item.description: Open-Sora: Open-source video generation model. ColossalChat: A chatbot developed with ColossalAI. Instruction in the Wild: 110K high-quailty user-based instructions. awesome-huge-models: Collection of huge AI models. hugo-theme-phd: Hugo theme for this page. Overview of the Evolution of the Universe and Related Disciplines
